about_the_game:
WELCOME, BALLER!

Ballest of Them All is a high-speed, physics-driven time-attack game where precision, momentum, and quick thinking separate the best from the rest. Master simple controls to flow your way through a mix of obstacle courses and speed tracks.

WHO IS THIS GAME FOR?

This game is built for people that enjoy:

  • Movement games that provide a sense of flow

  • Time-attack games that test your planning as much as your execution

  • Climbing games with technical challenges

  • Simple controls that take time to master

BECOME THE BALLEST OF THEM ALL

Master the art of momentum as you control a high-speed physics ball across a variety of challenging tracks. Each course is a unique challenge, packed with ramps, jumps, balance beams, and other obstacles designed to test your skill and creativity. As you master your ball, you'll discover routes that you never thought were possible. 

PRESS R TO IMPROVE

Speed alone won’t earn the crown—you’ll need the right route and precise control to shave milliseconds off your time. The path you choose could be the difference between leaderboard fame and second place.

TWO MODES 

  • TRIALS – Highly repeatable, bite-sized tracks that test your skills in a variety of ways

  • THE TOWER – One challenging endurance track built to push your consistency to the limit

DEMO AVAILABLE FEBRUARY 2025

  • 3 medium-difficulty Trial maps

  • 1 ninja-difficulty Trial map

  • The Tower, and a crown for beating it

  • Global leaderboards

  • Controller support for gameplay only (UI support coming soon!)

Note from the developer:

This game is inspired by games like the Trials franchise, Trackmania, and Super Monkey Ball. I wanted to capture the magic of a game with delightful controls underneath an unassuming surface, and I hope I did that for you. 

Your feedback helps me make BOTA better. BOTA will launch in Early Access as soon as I'm able to address feedback that players provide during February 2025's Next Fest.

name: Ballest of Them All

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10, 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6750, 2.66 GHz | AMD Phenom II X3 720, 2.8 GHz (w/ at least 3-threads)
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 650 Ti or AMD Radeon HD 7770
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3470, AMD FX 6100
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD Radeon R9 270X
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A physics-based platformer with flow. Master your momentum to earn medals on 20 highly-replayable tracks, or climb the Tower to prove you're the Ballest of Them All.
